{{Location Intro|description=<p>The area spans near the north coast of [[Dharma Forest]]. It begins at [[Mawtiyima Forest]], which is close to [[Minlin]] and [[Chenyu Vale: Southern Mountain]], ends at the west slope of a nameless mountain to the west of [[Bayda Harbor]], connecting with [[Desert of Hadramaveth]] and [[Realm of Farakhkert]].</p>}}
